summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 7227, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourth Avenue West, from Republican Street to Harrison Street, by laying a water main of proper dimensions, in said portion of said avenue, together with all the necessary appurtenances; and providing for the payment herefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 said city, approved December 6, 1899."
